## Is your feature request related to a problem?
A clear and concise description of the problem. E.g., "I'm frustrated when..."

## Proposed Solution
A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.

## Alternatives Considered
A description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Implementation Ideas
If you have thoughts on how this could be implemented, share them here:

- [ ] New `IStateEncoder` implementation for domain X
- [ ] New `IGraphMemory` backend for database Y
- [ ] New PoC experiment for domain Z
- [ ] Performance optimization
- [ ] Documentation improvement

## Additional Context
Add any other context, references, or screenshots about the feature request.
